poetry_tests.prompt: Write a poem about spring with vivid imagery and emotional depth
Write a nostalgic poem about hometown and childhood memories
Write a romantic poem about love and connection
Write a philosophical poem about the meaning of life
Write a free verse poem about modern technology and humanity

story_tests.prompt: Write a short science fiction story about first contact with aliens
Write a mystery story with an unexpected twist ending
Write a fairy tale about courage and friendship
Write a realistic story about overcoming personal challenges
Write a historical fiction story set in ancient times
